.. py:function:: import_submodules_contents(module)

   Import contents of all submodules.

   Source:

   :param module: Module.

   :returns: Dictionary of imported submodules contents.


.. py:class:: ZooBlockClassRepository

   Bases: :py:obj:`bosk.block.repo.scope.ScopeBlockClassRepository`

   Block class repository that extracts block classes from
   `block.zoo` submodule.
